experience.description: Design and deliver curriculum for Biology and Chemistry courses for grades 9-12. Implement differentiated instruction strategies to support diverse learners and utilize data-driven assessments to track student progress and modify instructional techniques.

Co-taught high school Earth Science classes under the supervision of a mentor teacher. Developed lesson plans, managed classroom behavior, and integrated digital learning tools to improve student engagement in a hybrid learning environment.
Provided one-on-one and small group instruction for high school students in STEM subjects, focusing on exam preparation and foundational concept mastery.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
